thread.title: Acne Studios Launches Second Emoji-Inspired Collection
thread.title_full: Acne Studios Launches Second Emoji-Inspired Collection

author: Kam Dhillon
title: Acne Studios Launches Second Emoji-Inspired Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 13 images from this gallery. 
We have some good news for those who proudly call their mother tongue ‘Emoji’. The Stockholm-based fashion house, Acne Studios, are set to launch their second emoji collection today, updated with mushrooms and peace signs.
Since launching their first emoji-inspired collection in August last year, this season’s rendition takes its aesthetic cues from the label’s Resort 2017 collection, which was writ large with everything from peace signs to skulls in vivacious colorways.
You’ll find emoji-inspired graphic prints on wardrobe staples such as sweatshirt and T-shirts, in solid colorways like black, white and gray as well as some different tie-dye prints.
Shop Now For more news on Acne Studios, check out our coverage from the cult brand’s FW17 Men’s show .
